detail_desc: Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Soft bra in organic cotton jersey with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, wide elastic at the hem and no fasteners.
Lace top with raw edges, a stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Longer, V-neck cardigan in crushed velvet with a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front, long sleeves with a decorative flounce and a detachable tie belt.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted, calf-length dress in glittery velour with narrow shoulder straps and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Hooded jumper in fine-knit cotton layered over a jersey hem.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Wide braided velvet Alice band.
Tights in soft microfibre with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Small frill trim around the neckline and over the shoulders and long sleeves with a smocked seam at the top to create a puff effect at the shoulders. Narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lace tights with an elasticated waist.
Gently flared top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Patterned pyjama top and leggings in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with frills on the shoulders and leggings with an elasticated waist.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Trousers in an airy, patterned weave with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a low, rib-trimmed shaft and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Super push-up bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace and mesh trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.
Bolero in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Sports vest top in a double layer of soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with short slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in patterned, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front.
Short jumper in a chunky-knit cotton blend with braided details at the top and raglan sleeves.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Hairband in woven fabric with a sheen. Knot detail at the front and elastication at the back.

Dress in soft velour and a pair of leggings and hairband in patterned cotton jersey. Dress with a press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam at the top and flared skirt with heart-shaped pockets on the front. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Double-layered hairband with a decorative knot detail at the front.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the front. Seam with covered elastication at the waist and decorative ties at the sides.
Dress in tulle with sequined embroidery and floral appliqués. V-neck a the back, buttons down the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt in several layers of tulle. Lined.
Sleeveless top with a V-neck front and back.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved football shirt in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with press-studs at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, ribbed neckline.

Padded parka in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. High stand-up collar with a zip and a wind flap with buttons down the front. Flap front pockets with a button, handwarmer pockets with press-studs, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Windbreaker in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a zip down the front and mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in mesh.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and loop at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lacing down the legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Straight-cut coat in pile with notch lapels, press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Leggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Skirt in a viscose weave with ties at the front of the waist and elastication at the back. Wrapover front with flounced trims and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton pointelle jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Romper suit in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups. Sun hat with ties under the chin. Lined.
Cropped vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw, roll-edge hem.
Fully lined, glittery bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
Long-sleeved shirts in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Socks in a soft, hole-patterned knit with elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Slip-on trainers in grained imitation leather. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a double-layered frill around the neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication and a double-layered frill trim at the hems. Buttons down the front made of shells that are decorative at the top and functional at the bottom. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Blouse in spotted mesh with sequin appliqués and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Frilled yoke, short sleeves with frill trims and a flare to the hem. Partly lined.

Blouse in airy, pattern-weave viscose with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fully lined bikini with an all-over print. Top with a bow at the front, adjustable shoulder straps and plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with bows at the sides.
Leggings in different colours of stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
